sentences.en: Fuel cells are intrinsically more efficient than most other energy - conversion devices.
sentences.cn: 本质上,燃料电池比其它大部分能量转换装置有效率.

sentences.en: Human nature is not intrinsically corrupt -- it is intrinsically good.
sentences.cn: 人的本性并非本来堕落, 而是天生善良.

sentences.en: I argue that confinement is intrinsically impractical.
sentences.cn: 我觉得限制手段本质上是不牢靠的.

sentences.en: I don't blame the environmentalists: the problem intrinsically complicated.
sentences.cn: 这不能怪他们: 这个问题本身就十分复杂.

sentences.en: It was intrinsically a very powerful ship.
sentences.cn: 它本身是一艘动力非常强劲的船。

sentences.en: Magnets are so intrinsically engaging, children and adults alike are all discovering the joy of them.
sentences.cn: 磁铁,使内在的迷人, 儿童和成年人都发现的喜悦.

sentences.en: Money economy and the dominance of the intellect are intrinsically connected.
sentences.cn: 货币经济与理性操控被内在联结在一起.

sentences.en: The future of high temperature organic solids lies with intrinsically rigid, linear macromolecules.
sentences.cn: 高温有机物固体的前途在于它具有真正刚硬, 线型的大分子.

sentences.en: The presumption is that visual objects are intrinsically alienating.
sentences.cn: 推测出视觉客体在本质上是异化的.

sentences.en: The Romantics believed that the life of the imagination was intrinsically valuable.
sentences.cn: 浪漫主义作家认为想像的生命力本身就很重要.

sentences.en: These two problems are intrinsically different.
sentences.cn: 这两个问题有本质上的不同.

sentences.en: Vary ways of workout to release oneself from stress intrinsically and extrinsically.
sentences.cn: 以瑜珈和放松技巧为主,强调身心的开发与协调.

sentences.en: What is called and coherence in writing is intrinsically the collocation relations of words and expressions.
sentences.cn: 而所谓文理,从本质上说,就是词语搭配关系.

sentences.en: You enjoy being with the beloved just as much as, and often even more than, you like doing the intrinsically valuable activities.
sentences.cn: 你想要和心爱的人在一起的愿望，与你想从事具有内在价值的活动的愿望一样大，甚至更大。

sentences.en: You intrinsically did a wrong thing.
sentences.cn: 本质上你做了一件错事.
